content: this pattern is one pdf file with detailed instructions for the mice a sleigh presents trees candy cane and a ladder the pattern is written in english using us crochet terminology instructions are easy to follow if you are familiar with basic crochet techniques and pictures are included approx size of a mouse is 8cm a sleigh is approx 20-7-5 length-width-heigth in cm skill level intermediate you should know single_crochet slip_stitch increase decrease single_crochet 3 stitches together crochet in rounds and row magic_ring working in front and back loops and basic sewing thank you very much and happy crocheting
